question: Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?
answers: Ntihanyurwa   n'ibinyabiziga   bifite uburemere burenze ubwerekanwa ku cyapa
Ntihanyurwa  n'ibinyabiziga  bifite uburemere  ku mutambiko burenze ubwerekanwa n' ikimenyetso
Ntihanyurwa na romoruki zifite uburemere burenze ubwerekanwa n'ikimenyetse

question: Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana,iyo bigenda bigomba kugira iki?
Ahatari mu nsisiro, ibyapa biburira n'ibyo gutambuka mbere bigomba gushyirwa mu ntera ingana gute?
Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?
answers: Ahantu hemewe guparika imodoka zitwara abagenzi gusa
Ahantu hemewe guparika  igihe gito gusa

question: Icyapa kerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kitagomba kurenza mu isaha gishyirwa ku binyabiziga bihe?
answers: Ibinyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga toni 3
Ibinyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga toni 5

question: Mu bitegekwa n'umukozi ubifitiye ububasha Kuzunguza intambike itara ritukura bitegeka guhagarara nde?
Umugenzi wese uri mu nzira nyabagendwa agomba guhita yumvira ibitegetswe nande?
Amapikipiki adafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande iyo bitagishoboka kubona muri 200m agomba kugaragazwa inyuma n'amatara yahe?
Iyo ikinyabiziga kikoreye ibintu birebire bidashobora kugabanywa icyo gihe imizigo ntishobora kurenza, ku mpera y'inyuma y'ikinyabiziga
Ibyandikishije ibara ryera mu muhanda bishobora gukora iki?
Iki cyapa gikoreshwa ryari?
answers: Mu nzira yagutse gitegeka imodoka gukoresha icyanya cyabugenewe
Mu nzira ifunganye gitegeka ikinyabiziga guhigamira ibinyabiziga biturutse imbere

question: Intera nini hagati y'urubibi rw'inyuma rw'ibyapa n'urubavu rw'ikinyabiziga ingana ite?
Ni gute amatara acanwa muri iki gihe imvura igwa
Ni gute umuyobozi yitwara muri aka kanya?
answers: Kureba neza niba ntacyo bitwaye atambutse

question: Amatara ndanga cyerekezo agomba kugaragara n'ijoro igihe ijoro rikeye, mu ntera nibura ya metero 150 no ku manywa igihe cy'umucyo, mu ntera ya metero zingahe?
Bamwe muri aba bantu bubahiriza ibyo abanyamaguru bategetswe
Ni iki umuyobozi akora iyo bimeze gutya?
answers: Kubahiriza icyo amatara yo mu sangano ategeka

question: Umwanya usigara hagati y'ibinyabiziga bibiri bihagaze umwanya munini ku ruhande rumwe rw'umuhanda ubisikanirwamo kandi utuma hahita ibinyabiziga bibiri gusa ugomba kungana nibura gute?
answers: 10m mu nsisiro na 15m ahatari mu nsisiro
5m mu nsisiro na 20m ahatari mu nsisiro
15m mu nsisiro na 25m ahatari mu nsisiro
10m mu nsisiro na 20m ahatari mu nsisiro

question: Iyo kugenda mu muhanda bidashobora kunyuzwa mu yindi nzira ku buryo bworoshye, icyerekezo kimwe gishobora gushyirwaho gute?
